pullrequest.title: Don't shut down gazebo when removing a world -> 8

content.raw:
this would only run the test if a gpu is present:

~~~
diff -r 1e0b9c165e43 test/integration/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/test/integration/CMakeLists.txt   Thu Feb 08 12:55:15 2018 -0800
+++ b/test/integration/CMakeLists.txt   Fri Feb 09 01:18:44 2018 -0800
@@ -105,7 +105,6 @@
   world_entity_below_point.cc
   world_playback.cc
   world_population.cc
-  world_remove.cc
   worlds_installed.cc
   )
 
@@ -169,6 +168,7 @@
   speed_pr2.cc
   visual.cc
   wideanglecamera_sensor.cc
+  world_remove.cc
   world_reset.cc
 )
 gz_build_dri_tests(${dri_tests} EXTRA_LIBS gazebo_test_fixture)
~~~
content.html:
this would only run the test if a gpu is present:

diff -r 1e0b9c165e43 test/integration/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/test/integration/CMakeLists.txt   Thu Feb 08 12:55:15 2018 -0800
+++ b/test/integration/CMakeLists.txt   Fri Feb 09 01:18:44 2018 -0800
@@ -105,7 +105,6 @@
   world_entity_below_point.cc
   world_playback.cc
   world_population.cc
-  world_remove.cc
   worlds_installed.cc
   )

@@ -169,6 +168,7 @@
   speed_pr2.cc
   visual.cc
   wideanglecamera_sensor.cc
+  world_remove.cc
   world_reset.cc
 )
 gz_build_dri_tests(${dri_tests} EXTRA_LIBS gazebo_test_fixture)
